main event: A large, round, white glow was observed moving slowly over Chico, California at low altitude (less than 2000 feet) on August 5, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for 2-3 minutes and was making no sound.
The object started moving north, then stopped, and then moved northeast before disappearing.
The observation was made from the top of a motel in Chico, California.
The report is from Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program that investigated UFO sightings.
photographs: no photographs included in the report
